definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: = Ludda 1 Makk 1Ma 11:34, Ac 9:32, Ac 9:35, Ac 9:38, Lydda, mod. Ludd, c. 11 miles SE. fr. Jaffa, toward Jerusalem; Rob:BR ii. 244–248 GASm:Geogr. 160ff. Buhl:Geogr. 197 1Ch 8:12 ([[וּבְנׁתֶיהָ]] ´[[ל]]), Ezr 2:33 ([[בְּנֵי לֽד]]) = Ne 7:37, cf. Ne 11:35; LXX Lwd, Lod, Luddwn, Ludda.
